activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9814
activity.text:
@Jacobjeevan 
## Changes
* Replaced checkbox with Shadcn
* Got rid of console.log()
* Added toast and progress bar regardless of file conversion being instantaneous
## Tests that i ran on file uploads 
- I added some large size images (100mb + ) Still found out file conversion takes place instantly but takes upload time.
- when there are 15 or more images file conversion takes place instantly. It only takes time to upload which already has a progress bar 
- Adding large-sized images along with more than 15 images caused the entire website to lag, making it difficult to navigate to the upload button.This prompted me to add a progress bar regardless.

## Bugs found

When there are a lot of files in the preview it overflows the viewport height . I am planning to open a new issue for this due to separation of concerns. What do you say ?

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/66351f36-e3b7-4457-9db0-4c75055bffc4

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9814
activity.text:
@Jacobjeevan I've implemented the changes, but I'm still experiencing an issue where I need to click twice on either the 'Combine PDF' or 'Upload File' options. Could you please confirm if this issue is occurring on your side as well?

If itâ€™s not an isolated issue and is happening globally, it might be related to how useState is being used inside the onSelect handler. I haven't been able to pinpoint the exact cause yet. It would be greatly appreciated if you could share any insights on how to fix this, as I plan to address it as soon as possible.
